blogPost.excerpt: Grow your agency faster with a one-stop solution to manage your leads, proposals, clients, and invoices. Create customizable proposals, close deals quickly, and receive faster payments from your clients.
blogPost.body: Grow your agency faster with a one-stop solution to manage your leads, proposals, clients, and invoices. Create customizable proposals, close deals quickly, and receive faster payments from your clients.
blogPost.title: Clientjoy - Manage leads, proposals, clients, invoicing and revenues
blogPost.author: Stephen Campbell

localize.description: 使用一站式解决方案来管理您的销售线索、计划书、客户和发票，从而更快地发展您的机构。创建可定制的建议书，快速完成交易，并更快地从客户那里获得付款。
localize.tagline: 管理销售线索、建议书、客户、发票和收入

localize.description: 使用一站式解決方案來管理您的銷售線索、計劃書、客戶和發票，從而更快地發展您的機構。創建可定製的建議書，快速完成交易，並更快地從客戶那裏獲得付款。
localize.tagline: 管理銷售線索、建議書、客戶、發票和收入

previous.excerpt: The app calculates well-known SaaS metrics from your subscriptions data in Google Sheets. Prepare your data in a recognized format. Include Customer ID, start date, end date and monthly value of subscriptions. Once you have it ready you can calculate SaaS-related subscriptions based on it.
previous.title: Probe - Calculate your SaaS metrics with one click in Google Sheets

localize.description: 该应用程序根据您在Google Sheet中的订阅数据计算出知名的SaaS指标。以可识别的格式准备数据。包括订阅的客户ID、开始日期、结束日期和月值。一旦准备就绪，您就可以根据它计算与SaaS相关的订阅量。
localize.tagline: 在Google Sheets中单击一下即可计算您的SaaS指标

localize.description: 該應用程序根據您在Google Sheet中的訂閱數據計算出知名的SaaS指標。以可識別的格式準備數據。包括訂閱的客戶ID、開始日期、結束日期和月值。一旦準備就緒，您就可以根據它計算與SaaS相關的訂閱量。
localize.tagline: 在Google Sheets中單擊一下即可計算您的SaaS指標

next.excerpt: Neverlose.money is the first-ever gamified DeFi protocol that pays a bonus to long-term investors, known as HODLers, using the penalty charge paid by users who fail to HODL.
next.title: Neverlose.money - A DeFi protocol that lets you invest crypto like Mr. Buffett

localize.description: Neverlose.Money是有史以来第一个游戏化的Defi协议，它向被称为HODLers的长期投资者支付奖金，使用未能Hodl的用户支付的惩罚性费用。
localize.tagline: 一种Defi协议，让你像巴菲特先生一样投资密码

localize.description: Neverlose.Money是有史以來第一個遊戲化的Defi協議，它向被稱爲HODLers的長期投資者支付獎金，使用未能Hodl的用戶支付的懲罰性費用。
localize.tagline: 一種Defi協議，讓你像巴菲特先生一樣投資密碼
